CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.Name: Cosmere_Metal_Nicrosil
CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.label: Nicrosil
CosmereResources.Def.MetalDef.description: Nicrosil is a high-performance alloy crafted from nickel and chromium. Renowned for its exceptional corrosion resistance and structural integrity, nicrosil excels in challenging environments where durability is paramount.
